infobox.Japanese title:: 黒いイカロスの翼  (Kuroi Ikarosu no Tsubasa)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Honami Shimogasa  Minaho Shimogasa  Yoko Okino  Shingo Nachi
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Hiroto Torihata as Mitsuyuki Arimori  Yuko Mizutani as Shinobu Shimon  Miki Nagasawa as Minaho Shimogasa  Kyouko Iijima as Honami Shimogasa  Nobuaki Fukuda as Hidehiko Shiromoto  Yoko Soumi as Chizuru Bizen  Ryoichi Tanaka as Kouta Miyabe  Masahiko Tanaka as Koichi Mito  Isshin Chiba as Detective A (Episode 204)  Takashi Nagasako as Coroner (Episode 204)  Katsuyuki Konishi as Forensics officer (Episode 204)  Takayuki Inoue as Policeman (Episode 204)

sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are staying at a hotel in Yamamoto mountains, Nagano Prefecture, where they meet the twins from the case of the cursed mask as workers and Kogoro watches Shingo Nachi and Yoko Okino's completed TV drama in the lobby. Later, an actress comes and causes trouble. The next day, she is found hanged in her room.

In Greek Mythology, Icarus, who received wings, forgot his father's warning that he shouldn't fly too high, and flew higher and higher. He believed he could fly to the sun. But Icarus' wings couldn't bear the heat when he got too close to the sun. After his wings burned, Icarus fell from the sky right to the ground.
After investigating in the crime scene, Conan understands that Bizen's death wasn't a suicide, but a murder. He collects pieces of evidence, gets Kogoro asleep, and solves the case.

sections.Resolution:
The proof is a special type of pollen unique to a butterfly from the valley that was on Chizuru's clothes that had been unknowingly transferred from Arimori's shoulder when he was carrying the corpse.
He reveals that the actress was his brother's lover, she had made him spend large amounts of money repeatedly and although his brother truly loved her she did not. Eventually she decided to break up with him to be with a much richer man, broken hearted he flew on his hang glider, however he miscalculated the trajectory and ended up plummeting to his death. He reveals that he tried to ask the actress to say a few words on his brother's grave but she refused and he decided to kill her.

- Deceased (fell)
- Mitsuyuki's younger brother
- Shinobu's friend
- Chizuru’s Ex-Boyfriend
- Mitsuyuki and Teruhiko's late father
- Hotel Arimori founder
sections.Trivia:
- The Shimogasa twins from A Cursed Mask Coldly Laughs reappear in this episode. Considering that the screenwriter Chiaki Hashiba had passed away when that case was aired, it might have been added by Koujin Ochi during the episode conception, since he wrote episode 184 and played the role of storyboard and part 1 episode director for this case.
- Kogoro watched the completed TV drama starred by Yoko Okino called "The Stalker Who Laughted at the Darkness", broadcasted in a Tuesday Suspense Drama by Nichiuri TV. First mentioned in On Location, TV Drama Murder Case, which was the first TV original episode written by Koujin Ochi, under the name of Ochi Hirohito.
- Mitsuyuki Arimori's bus is a 1999 gray Nissan Civilian.
- Hidehiko Shiromoto's off-road is a 1994 dark blue Honda Crossroad Series I [LJ].
- Shinobu Shimon's car is a white Toyota Crown [S140].
- In Hotel Arimori, the painting with mountains reappears in Beika Central Hospital from Captured in Her Eyes, in the ropeway cabin from The Entrance to the Maze: The Anger of the Colossus, and in Tachibana villa from The Bay of Revenge; the one with a hut on the lake is from Izu Hospital in Scuba Diving Murder Case; and the two with flowers are from the mountains in this episode.

sections.Quotes:
- Sleeping Kogoro:
I wonder if your younger brother is happy about this? Butterflies are said to be the soul of the dead. To me, it looks as though your younger brother's soul tried to stop you and stopped to rest on your shoulder.  (弟さん喜んでいるでしょうか？チョウは亡き人の魂ともいいます。私にはまるで、弟さんの魂が罪を犯そうとしているあなたを止めようとあなたの肩で羽を休めたように思えるんですが……)
